body:
This document is an international treaty binding under the international law.
    The treaty has to be signed by at least one sovereign international entity or an international organisation in order to be valid.
    This treaty has to follow the Vienna Convention on the Law of Treaties hereinafter referred to as VCLT.
    The treaty is public, and will be accessible through United Micronations, hereinafter referred to as UM.

UM is an international organisation managing micronations, providing treaties,communication with United Nations,
    hereinafter referred to as UN, and communication with macronations.
